name: Devil's Kitchen (Free Alpha)
description:
Devil's Kitchen is a topdown indie game and a unique take on two genres: Bullet Hells and Kitchen Games hybrid. Ready to run the hottest restaurant in hell?

Supporting Linux, Windows and MacOS!

In order to do your work accordingly, you'll have to dodge all kinds of weird insect enemies as well as the ingredients going at full speed. You'll be able to deliver bizarre dishes by getting a specific combination of human parts!

By doing a good job, you'll earn tips to buy a variety of cosmetics and weapons that will not only look great, but also affect your gameplay.

The game has a familiar day progression system; the more days you advance, the more difficult the game will get. At the end of each week, you will also have some "Special Days" where the game will change drastically.

Enjoy a mixture of jazz and metal music that creates a unique and funky experience!

This simple yet extremely fun and weird game has been developed by...

Huge thanks to all our fans that supported us from the start of development as well as our amazing and lovely families.

BrainCanibala - Visuals, original concept, gameplay design, sound design, music composition, promotional art, storywriting.

Philipps - Original gameplay idea, some concepts.
